code: import axios from'axios';import authHeader from'../services/authHeader';import{API_URL}from'../Constants';export var remove=function remove(val){axios.delete(API_URL+'calc/all/'+val,{headers:authHeader()}).then(function(r){});};export var saveFood=function saveFood(stoObj){return axios.post(API_URL+"calc/add",stoObj,{headers:authHeader()});};export var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(API_URL+'calc/all',{headers:authHeader()});};export var getFavourites=function getFavourites(){return axios.get(API_URL+'favourites/user',{headers:authHeader()});};
